name: Shada Trapp
text: I LOVE hungry Howie's my family and I love pizza!! Hungry Howie's never disappoints the pizza is always hot and fresh exactly to your liking. The deep dish pizza will blow your mind and you still get to choose the flavor of your crust ü§Ø Amazing!!

name: Cheryl Irwin-kalapp
text: Best pizza ever!  Try the pineapple,  tomato, jalape√±os.

name: Kait Tromans
text: Good price, okay pizza.  I ordered a pizza this evening and was a bit disappointed with the lack of toppings on my pizza.

name: Quitta J
text: I got one of the cooked subs I believe. The only issue was that some of the bacon was undercooked. I just discarded those pieces, but otherwise it was great.

name: Melissa Conger
text: I work here.

name: Christie Hawkins
text: Excellent Italian oven baked sub

name: C Harris
text: Always great tasting pizza since forever. Never had bad experience with Howie's

name: Tamara Summers
text: I ordered a large pizza and cookie cake today on their online order app.  It came very quick and was cooked to perfection.  Their staff is wonderful.  Will order from them again.

name: Summer Stallings
text: I love hungry howies. I think their pizza is one of the best around besides papa johns or dominos. The crust is so good, my fave is stuffed garlic crust. I like that they have subs or salads as well! I love how big the salads come. ‚Ä¶More

name: William Taylor
text: They done a great job with our big order for a birthday party. After speaking to the cook I was very confident in his ability to have them ready.  He did just as he said he would.  Thank you very much.

name: Isaiah Gordon
text: Irrational employment, discriminating representatives, unfair management, and complete negligence to their employees. Unsanitary behind the scenes and various non thoroughly washed hands. Eat somewhere else! Save your time, stomachs, and money!

name: KerlyKeely
text: my sister and i came here for some pizza, we got a medium, my sister asked if we could get stuffed crust, but the guy who worked there said stuffed was for large pizzas. he left for a second and came back with string cheese, my sister and i are very happy abt this. thank you person who worked there.

name: Dashawn Whiteside
text: A hidden gem! Love the flavor crusts. Reasonable prices too. Small two topping for $5 is a filling deal.

name: Andres Yi
text: Very consistent with their pizza textures and flavors. The one in High Point Road was not the same as this one..

name: Amy Adams
text: First time getting pizza here, got a coupon in the mail for a free pizza, so decided to try it. Great pizza, great service! Will definitely come back!

name: Teresa Farrar
text: Made very fast and taste great.

name: Jack Priddy
text: Best pizza in Greensboro PERIOD. Amazing people working here. Great flavored pizza. Hope they succeed with their business.

name: David Cornelius
text:
Great service. Quick. Pretty good food.
Lunch specials are clutch.

name: Google User
text: Good pizza with good deals available all of the time.  Can request extra sauce on pizza as well. Flavored crusts are good. Cheesy bread is good too. Most importantly, my kids eat well here.

name: SCLS NS336
text: I've been ordering from here for a while, great prices and good quality, but tonight I ordered and for whatever reason they never delivered the pizzas...... Definitely will never be spending any money here ever again

name: Ishrah Holyspell
text: These people writing these reviews must be robots or something because although the delivery guy was supremely nice and awesome, the pizza tasted like air with garlic. ‚Ä¶More

name: Maria Alvarez
text: Best pizza around!! Very friendly staff!!

name: Susan Van Gelder
text: For the second time in a row, they gave me the wrong pizza.

name: Rachel Holder
text: Best pizza we have had in a very long time

name: Jared NoneYa
text: Clean restaurant friendly staff and quick service. Love their Pizza.

name: Steve Witek
text: Took a couple kids to eat. They do have some inside seating. Kids loved the different crust flavors and was able to use a coupon. No fountain drinks. These places are mainly for takeout it looks like.

name: Jay Dee
text: Good pizza, good price & something for everyone in the family!üëç

name: lorie meyers
text: Great pizza great price. They also serve wings and each first Monday of each month. They offer Pepperoni or cheese medium pizza for $2.99. No limit. Choice of butter or butter and parmigiano cheese crust

name: James McGlinchey
text: Awesome pizza and delivery

name: Matt3046
text: The food and price were both pretty good  but the place was understaffed and it took an hour to get a carryout order.

name: Secrett Happy Place
text: Best pizza crust o have ever had. It really makes the pizza special.

name: Caroline Cartier
text: so tasty, excellent service from easy online ordering to in store pickup to delivery! used to order before they shut down and was ok, now under new people and great workers this pizza is my favorite in greensboro!

name: Shanna Dowd
text: My son loves the pizza & I love the prices - they always have great deals

name: Cassidy Wilson
text: Pizza could have had slightly more flavor.

name: Kevin Fox
text: Fantastic oven-baked subs

name: Jorge Barrera
text: When you are Hungry

name: Terry Underwood
text: Good prices

name: Teresa Leazer
text: Subs are Delicious.

name: Ricky Campbell
text: Great pizza

name: Kawana Brown
text: Love

name: Marquise Lambert
text: My husband is addicted

name: Terry Underwood
text: Good prices

name: Kevin Wilson
text: Good wings & subs

name: Felicia Morrison
text: My food tonight was great!!!

name: Bambi Rivas
text: Awesome food
